items.title: Asm1
items.content_html:
```asm

data segment a db "ABC" s db "Hello$world!", 0Dh, 0Ah, 0 ;把s中字符串打印到屏幕上 data ends

main: mov ax, seg s ;ax存放s的段地址 mov ds, ax mov bx, 0

``...
